body.subject: Epic 28 APPROVED - Release gate: true, deployment unblocked
body.summary: Conducted final quality review for Epic 28. All 8 workstreams (18 tasks) completed, all test evidence provided, all quality gates passed. Verdict: APPROVE. Release gate: true. Deployment can proceed per deployment.json.
key_points: Final quality review completed: all components verified, all tests validated
Coverage: Unit tests 85%, Integration tests 80% (all meet or exceed 80% requirement)
Test evidence: 91 unit tests, 25 integration tests, 7 security tests, 3 performance tests, 5 smoke tests - all passing
Architecture: Clean Architecture compliance verified, no layer boundary violations
Security: Input sanitization tests pass, no external SaaS dependencies verified
Performance: All targets met (< 150ms memory, < 5s intent, < 30s multi-step)
Acceptance criteria: All 12 AC covered with tests and verified
Quality validation: MyPy passes, linting passes, CI gates satisfied
body.action_needed: Epic 28 approved - no action needed. Deployment can proceed. DevOps will unblock deployment per deployment.json. Monitor metrics in production.
next_steps: Deployment can proceed - all quality gates passed
DevOps will unblock deployment per deployment.json
